sentences.en: Children are quick to accustom themselves to new surroundings.
sentences.cn: 孩子们很快就会适应新环境.

sentences.en: He said I must accustom myself to be more at ease when I am with people.
sentences.cn: 他说和别人在一起时我要慢慢做到别太拘束.

sentences.en: He would never accustom himself to drinking nothing but cocacola.
sentences.cn: 他将永远无法过那种只喝可口可乐的日子.

sentences.en: It took a while for her eyes to accustom themselves to the dark.
sentences.cn: 她的眼睛过了一会儿才适应了黑暗.

sentences.en: It's difficult for the young people to accustom to the elderly people's ideas.
sentences.cn: 年轻人难以理解老年人的心理.

sentences.en: She tried to accustom herself to the tight bandages.
sentences.cn: 她尝试着使自己习惯那些紧绷的绷带。

sentences.en: The just had to accustom , themselves to the new conditions, and stop complaining.
sentences.cn: 他们必须适应新环境, 并且停止埋怨.

sentences.en: We had to accustom ourselves to cold weather.
sentences.cn: 我们必须使自己适应寒冷天气.

trans.tran_en: to make yourself or another person become used to a situation or place
